references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper is foundational for text-to-image generation and is directly relevant to the image editing task, serving as a basis for many subsequent methods.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced a high-resolution image generation model which is crucial for high-quality image editing, and is directly used as a base model in the current work.

references.paper_title: InstructPix2Pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper is a direct predecessor to the current work, focusing on instruction-based image editing which is the central problem addressed in this paper.

references.paper_title: LAION-5B: An open large-scale dataset for training next generation image-text models
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale dataset used for training the model, directly impacting the model's capabilities and performance.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is a key component of many modern image editing methods, and its score is used as a metric to evaluate image quality in this paper.
